example_sentence_english: I take a bus every morning.

example_sentence_italian: Prendo un autobus per andare al lavoro.
example_sentence_english: I take a bus to go to work.

example_sentence_italian: L'autobus parte alle sei in punto.
example_sentence_english: The bus leaves at six o'clock.

example_sentence_italian: Gli autobus passano frequentemente in centro.
Gli autobus sono in ritardo oggi.

example_sentence_english: Get on the bus before it leaves.

example_sentence_italian: I passeggeri salgono agli autobus alla fila.
example_sentence_english: Passengers board the buses in the queue.

example_sentence_italian: Sono sceso dall'autobus alla fermata centrale.
example_sentence_english: I got off the bus at the central stop.

example_sentence_italian: Ho visto persone scendere dagli autobus.
example_sentence_english: I saw people getting off the buses.
There is a lot of noise in the bus.

example_sentence_italian: Negli autobus ci sono degli avvisi di sicurezza.
example_sentence_english: There are safety notices on the buses.
I lost my wallet on the bus.
There are announcements on the buses.
I traveled by the night bus.

notes: contraction of con + il; not used before a vowel; standard is 'con l''
example_sentence_english: Informal: I go by bus (non standard).

notes: contraction of con + i; not used before a vowel; standard is 'con gli' or 'con i' depending on context
example_sentence_italian: In alcune frasi arcaiche si trova 'coi autobus'.
example_sentence_english: In some archaic phrases you find 'coi autobus'.
